entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet run looks in the wrong bin/obj directories if targetting only one non-AnyCPU platform in <Platforms>, but works with <Platform> added #25514
  • [dotnet-watch] hot reload script injection should be more permisive. #25510
  • Some exceptions cannot be caught by a try/catch block or global exception handler #25509
  • Enable running Microsoft.NET.Build.Tasks.UnitTests in CI #25508
  • When multiple TargetFrameworks are used, RunProduceContentAssets is skipped on rebuild #25504

Closed

  • PackageValidation with --no-build when project has ProjectReference causes NETSDK1085 #24943
    7.0.1xx
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-preview.5.22257.3] All WPF apps launch failed with black screen or with exception about loading dlls #25289

PullRequests

Created

  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove dependency on Assembly.GetCallingAssembly #25494
    Area-Infrastructure, DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • Clear DOTNET_ROOT_arch environment variable #25480
  • Update Microsoft.NET.Compatibility.Common.targets #25132
    Area-Compatibility
  • document long paths-related error message when building on windows #25490
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • add tests to cover the resolution of AnalysisLevel known-strings #25454
    Area-NetSDK
  • Check if publishaot is used #25323
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1777920 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update Test project TestAppEchoDotnetRoot to current framework #22784
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #25479
    Area-Infrastructure
